Upaccati，（?） in phrase “akkhīni upacciṁsu” at J．VI，187 is probably faulty for apaciyiṁsu aor．of apaciyyati，Pass．of apacināti （cp．upaciyyati › upacināti） “the eyes failed”，lost power，went bad； cp．apacaya falling off，diminution．If not this reading we should suggest upacchijjiṁsu from upacchindati “were destroyed”，which however is not quite the sense wanted．（Page 140）
